00025 class StopCriterion {
00026 public:
00027         virtual ~StopCriterion() {}
00028         double eps;
00029         int numberMaxIter;
00030         int numbMaxIterAfterLastImp;
00042         void SetEps(double x) { eps = x; }
00043         double GetEps() { return eps; }
00044         void SetNumberMaxIter(int x) { numberMaxIter = x; }
00045         void SetNumbMaxIterAfterLastImp(int x) { numbMaxIterAfterLastImp = x; }
00046 
00047         virtual bool Stop(int iter, vector<double> x1, vector<double> x2, double  f1, double  f2, Function * func, int iterLatestImprov) = 0;
00048 };
